skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Eagle Eye
skillTree.description: There are any number of mysterious wonders secreted away in the shadows, for those discerning enough to find them.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%

skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.name: Motherland
skillTree.description: Ulrika has chosen to throw her lot in with her adopted kind, for better or for worse.

skillTree.name: Fatherland
skillTree.description: The ties of Kislev run deep, and not even the ravages of undeath can unseat them.

skillTree.name: Hates Slaanesh
skillTree.description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.name: Rapid Fire
skillTree.description: As skilled with a bow as she is with a sword, Ulrika will rain down arrows upon any too scared to close with her.

skillTree.name: Furious Assault
skillTree.description: Sometimes, there are moments when defense is no longer a priority, and the only thing that matters is getting the kill.

skillTree.name: Whirl of Blades
skillTree.description: Undefeated since she was 15 years old, Ulrika has long valued a good defense over a strong offense.

skillTree.name: Honour or Death
skillTree.description: Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death…

skillTree.name: Deathly Vigour
skillTree.description: If anything, this one has an even greater lust for life than they did before their death.

skillTree.name: Resilient Personality
skillTree.description: Able to cast off even her own vampiric sire with an act of will, Ulrika shall crumble before no one.

skillTree.name: Dance of Death
skillTree.description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Precise
skillTree.description: Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Shroud of Darkness
skillTree.description: This one doesn't just move in the shadows, they *are* the shadows…

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Counter-Striker
skillTree.description: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

skillTree.name: Supernatural Horror
skillTree.description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

skillTree.name: Lightning Reflexes
skillTree.description: The body of a Vampire looks human, but is capable of reactions so fast that even the quickest swordsman would look clumsy in comparison.

skillTree.name: Hawk-Eyed
skillTree.description: You have to get up very early if you want to beat this one; nothing escapes their keen eye and lightning reflexes.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Deadeye
skillTree.description: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.

skillTree.name: Spread Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Building
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

backgroundSkills.name: Arisen of Praag
backgroundSkills.description: Born of noble Kislevite stock and later transformed into a vampire, Ulrika still fights for the land of her birth.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Daemons
Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +20% when fighting against Skaven, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
